name: Vaccine Time
description:
In this thrilling game, you take on the role of a special microbe that can resist the deadly plague that has taken over the world. As you navigate through the bloodstream of the human body, you'll encounter a variety of obstacles and enemies, all trying to stop you from reaching your goal.

Using your unique abilities and clever strategies, you must fight off the plague's minions and defend the body you are in. The fate of the world is in your hands, and you'll need to use all of your skills and resources to emerge victorious.

With challenging gameplay, and a gripping storyline, this game is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat. Can you save the world from the deadly plague? Play now and find out!

The game was made for the Mini Game Jam 128
